title: Did the U.S. government deliberately poison 10,000 Americans during the embargo?
subtitle: The Internet diary claims that government agencies tried to reduce the consumption of illegal liquor by adding poison.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In 1926, the Federal Government poisoned alcohol to reduce consumption during the ban; by the time the ban ended in 1933, an estimated 10,000 people had died from this poisoning.
